full_text: Screened by NARA, 4/27/2023 1 completed, except for the construction of an extra room thereon, 2 which extra room is the sole responsibility of Grantees, who 3 have, by their separate agreement with the contractor and/or 4 contractors who constructed said dwelling, built said extra 5 room on their sole credit and responsibility. Grantees expressly 6 agree to hold Grantor harmless from any obligation arising out of 7 the construction of said extra room. 8 Grantees hereto agree to reimburse Grantor for half of 9 any filing or recording costs and/or any Federal Tax payments 10 made on account of transfer of said property, and the Grantor 11 agrees to obtain filing and recording of the Grant Deed, herein- 12 above described, and the Deed of Trust therewith, on execution 13 by the Grantees of said document. 14 Grantor agrees to pay the contractor constructing said 15 dwelling, any and all extras authorized by her to date over and 16 above the original construction terms of the contract between 17 her and the contractor who built said dwelling, excepting all 18 extras agreed to specifically between the contractor and Grantees 19 specifically including xtras appurtenant to said extra room herein- 20 above mentioned. 21 DATED: August 18 1948 22 BunDals 23 24 and Many Palos Grantees 25 26 Leisa g. Brouson Grantor 27 28 29 30 31 32 CARTER. YOUNG & ZETTERBERG ATTORNEYS AT LAW FIRST NAT'L BLDG. POMONA. CALIF. -2-
